title: Extreme Killing: Understanding Serial and Mass Murder
description: In Extreme Understanding Serial and Mass Murder , renowned experts James Alan Fox and Jack Levin examine the theories of criminal behavior and apply them to a multitude of well-known and lesser-known cases from around the world. The authors draw upon research from two large data sets - one comprised of serial killers and the other of those who have committed massacres. Extreme Killing is a fascinating introduction to an extreme set of homicidal behaviors for any interested reader.
author: James Alan Fox
